ADC_VALIDATION Body

Implements validation functionality for the internal meta data adminsitration.

Accessible by ADC_PLUGIN, ADC_UI, ADC_INTERNAL and ADC_ADMIN only.

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Private methods
parse
procedure parse(
p_stmt in varchar2
)

Method to parse a statement and throw and exception if parsing fails.

Parameter
p_stmt
in varchar2

Statement to parse.

Errors
SQL_ERROR

if parsing fails.

parse_sql
procedure parse_sql(
p_stmt in varchar2
)

Method to parse a statement and throw and exception if parsing fails.

Only select statements are allowed and correctly parsed.

Parameter
p_stmt
in varchar2

Statement to parse.

Errors
SQL_ERROR

if parsing fails.
